ITEMS.title: The Jungle
ITEMS.synopsis: While a documentary team searches remote parts of the Indonesian jungle looking for an endangered leopard, they soon realize they're being stalked.

ITEMS.title: Dawn of the Dead
ITEMS.synopsis: Picking up where 'Night of the Living Dead' left off, this horror classic begins with a flesh-eating zombie army invading every major American city.

ITEMS.title: Once Upon a Time in Vietnam
ITEMS.synopsis: Wandering the countryside, brooding warrior-monk Dao takes up arms to protect a village beleaguered by a crime boss. But Dao has his own past to face.

ITEMS.title: Allied
ITEMS.synopsis: Allied agent Max Vatan falls for a French spy during World War II. When Vatan learns she might be a double agent, he strives to prove her innocence.
